sqlMap.select:
SELECT REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", ID as "id", INVEN_BILL_NO as "invenBillNo", INVEN_STATUS as "invenStatus", WARE_HOUSE_NO as "wareHouseNo", ware_house_name as "wareHouseName", STORAGE_NO as "storageNo", STACK_NO as "stackNo", BILL_MAKE_TIME as "billMakeTime", BILL_MAKER as "billMaker", bill_maker_name as "billMakerName", BILL_CHECK_TIME as "billCheckTime", BILL_CHECKER as "billChecker", bill_checker_name as "billCheckerName" FROM si_inven WHERE 1=1
INVEN_BILL_NO = #invenBillNo#
date_format(BILL_MAKE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #beginTime#
date_format(BILL_MAKE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #endTime#
WARE_HOUSE_NO = #wareHouseNo#
INVEN_STATUS = #invenStatus#
DATA_GROUP_CODE = #dataGroupCode#
$orderBy$
INVEN_BILL_NO desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM si_inven WHERE 1=1
INVEN_BILL_NO = #invenBillNo#
date_format(BILL_MAKE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #beginTime#
date_format(BILL_MAKE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #endTime#
WARE_HOUSE_NO = #wareHouseNo#
INVEN_STATUS = #invenStatus#
DATA_GROUP_CODE = #dataGroupCode#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO si_inven (REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, DATA_GROUP_CODE, ARCHIVE_FLAG, ID, INVEN_BILL_NO, INVEN_STATUS, WARE_HOUSE_NO, ware_house_name, STORAGE_NO, STACK_NO, BILL_MAKE_TIME, BILL_MAKER, bill_maker_name, BILL_CHECK_TIME, BILL_CHECKER, bill_checker_name ) VALUES (#recCreator#, #recCreateTime#, #recRevisor#, #recReviseTime#, #dataGroupCode#, #archiveFlag#, #id#, #invenBillNo#, #invenStatus#, #wareHouseNo#, #wareHouseName#, #storageNo#, #stackNo#, #billMakeTime#, #billMaker#, #billMakerName#, #billCheckTime#, #billChecker#, #billCheckerName#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE si_inven SET
BILL_CHECK_TIME = #billCheckTime#,
BILL_CHECKER = #billChecker#,
bill_checker_name = #billCheckerName#,
INVEN_STATUS = #invenStatus#, REC_REVISOR = #recRevisor#, REC_REVISE_TIME = #recReviseTime# WHERE 1=1
id = #id#
INVEN_BILL_NO = #invenBillNo#
